about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hello! My name is Andrea Harkins (nee Maille) but feel free to call me Andy. I am a Technical Lead and Front-End Engineer based in Toronto, Canada.

I’m a people-first leader who believes in transparency, collaboration and continuous learning. I strive for success but also deeply care about how we get there. As a developer, I'm dedicated to developing accessible, user-friendly websites that engage users through responsive design and artistic flairs. I am a strong advocate for ethical practices within the tech space and strive to create more accessible, inclusive environments wherever I go.

When I’m not coding, you can catch me building a Spotify playlist, bullet journaling, or planning my next adventure.
